Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Jeffrey Alva Beall eligibility to apply for military service credit in the New York state teachers' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Jeffrey Alva Beall eligibility to apply for retroactive military service credit in the New York state teachers' retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize Jeffrey Alva Beall eligibility to apply for military service credit in the New York state teachers' retirement system
